post:
Hello!

We are LoveVPS™ we provide loveable VPS solutions for people like you and are proud to extend our range of KVM Virtual Servers to Los Angeles.

Our new LA KVM VPSs are located within the infamous One Wilshire facility with more than 300+ networks, on-net carriers & ISP's including 40+ AsiaPac carriers and ISP's, this teamed up with Any2 California: the second largest Internet peering exchange in the U.S makes for one fantastically connected building. When choosing a location for your west coast VPS the One Wilshire building should be top on everyone's list.

All of our LA services include:
- RAID 10 Storage
- Intel E3-1230 or above CPU
- Free Instant Setup with love!
- Supermicro Servers
- 24x7 Support
- SolusVM
- rDNS Capability

 >
